job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Aviture is a technology solutions organization made up of individuals who care about our trade and the impact of our services. We strive to make a true difference in our clients lives with the solutions we craft, ensuring the newest techniques are used effectively to promote innovation within our own walls and those of our clients. Our engineers work on next-generation systems across a wide variety of industries including the Department of Defense, communications, healthcare, energy, banking, retail, hospitality, logistics and technical R&D.The solutions we create haveSaved lives in the California wildfires and southern U.S. floodingProvided security for the Super Bowl and post-attack Boston MarathonProvided augmented-reality training environments for surgeonsEnabled major corporations to pivot into IoTIncreased transparency and promoted patient wellness in hospitals and senior care facilitiesProvided risk analysis of stock portfoliosCombined computer vision and robotics to automate dangerous manual labor tasksPreserved life and increased mission success by allowing government leaders to make quick and informed decisionsPart of our âsecret sauceâ is our continued exposure to diverse and interesting problems and the ability to share ideas across domains in a manner not typically done within a single industry.At our core, Aviture is a group of engineers seeking to build better solutions. We pursue people with aptitude and drive first and foremost; which allows us a staff that spans across all levels of experience, skillsets, and software disciplines. Our prime candidates are people who have technology in their DNA and want to pursue the âwhyâ behind their work. We value a healthy work-life balance so we provide flex time and reasonable hours, all while pushing ourselves to grow and become faster, better engineers.If this sounds like the kind of environment youâd like to be in, why donât you drop us a line? Weâd love to talk to you!RequirementsBS degree in Software Engineering related degree, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experienceSoftware development experience within web application development, mobile application development, service/API development, data storage/analytics, cloud platform (AWS/Azure/Google Cloud) development, IoT development and/or machine learning. Larger or more complex applications preferred Go-getter mentality with good communication skillsExperience working within a team preferredInterest and ability to learn new technologies/techniques BenefitsMedical, dental, vision and life insuranceMatching 401k with 100% vesting in six monthsIncentive and bonus payGenerous paid time offLaptop optionsPaid conferences and trainingResearch and development time Company vacationsFlex time scheduling Family eventsFree lunch FridaysQuarterly company eventAviture hosted Speaker Series
